projects.name: React E-Commerce Site
projects.description: This is an e-commerce website built with React. It has all the standard e-commerce site features including a shopping cart, pagination and search bar.

projects.name: React Drum-Machine
projects.description: A React drum machine. It is very similar in concept to a calculate built in React, except there are sound files associated with each button component

projects.name: React Space-X API
projects.description: This React application uses Axios to retrieve and display data from the Space-X api.

projects.name: Portfolio Site
projects.description: I am particularly proud of this personal porfolio website, because I designed it from scratch including the graphic design, HTML, SCSS, animations and Javascript.

projects.name: ResponsiveWebsite
projects.description: An HTML and CSS project for a responsive web programming course. It includes reponsive images, videos and iFrames.

projects.name: Javascript Canvas Animation
projects.description: A canvas animation that I completed on my own time to sharpen my Javascript skills.
